price: Na haiwafikii Ishara yoyote katika Ishara za Mola wao Mlezi ila wao huwa ni wenye kuipuuza.
arabic: وَمَا تَأۡتِيهِم مِّنۡ ءَايَةٖ مِّنۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ إِلَّا كَانُواْ عَنۡهَا مُعۡرِضِينَ
footnotes: Na haiwajii hoja katika hoja za Mola wao Mlezi, yenye kuonyesha Upweke wa Mwenyezi Mungu na uweza wake, ila wao huipa nyongo, hawaijali.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā tatīhim min āyatin min āyāti rabbihim illā kānū ʿanhā muʿ'riḍīna
